text:
StackAdapt - Toronto,ON http://www.stackadapt.com

StackAdapt is the world's first programmatic native advertising platform.

We're a small team based in downtown Toronto looking for our first Software Engineering hire. We're only 6 months old, boot-strapped, profitable, and looking to grow quickly.

This is a great opportunity if you want to work at a real startup where you'll be a key member of the team with room for growth, decision making opportunities, and unlimited upside potential.

Please contact me directly at yang@stackadapt.com
